mapper.select: SELECT b_product_color.`b_product_color_id`, b_product_color.`b_product_color_name`, DATE_FORMAT(b_product_color.`b_product_color_ctime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_product_color_ctime`, DATE_FORMAT(b_product_color.`b_product_color_mtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_product_color_mtime`, b_product_color.`b_product_color_width`, b_product_color.`b_product_color_height`, b_product_color.`xt_userinfo_id`, b_product_color.`b_product_color_sort`, b_product_color.`b_product_color_status`, b_product_color.`xt_attachment_id`, b_product_color.`b_product_id`, b_product_color.`b_product_color_remark`, b_product_color.`b_seller_id`, xt_userinfo.`xt_userinfo_realName`, b_seller.`b_seller_name` FROM b_product_color b_product_color LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo xt_userinfo ON b_product_color.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id LEFT JOIN b_seller b_seller ON b_seller.b_seller_id = b_product_color.b_seller_id WHERE b_product_color.b_product_color_id=#{b_product_color_id}
